message: See http://us.pycon.org/2011/tickets/room_sharing/ for the wiki page
Anyone feel like splitting a room for tuesday night, I have a room for hte other nights
@alex Which Tuesday?
@coderanger one before the conf stars
i'm still looking for a roommate for thursday night before the conference through tuesday night during the sprints
Alex -   Let me check in the morning;  I think I have an open spot Tues. night.
@Gulopine do you have a room and need someone split it, or do you need a room?
@gg i haven't reserved a room yet
Reserving a room is something you should probably look into soon, I had to email to reserve our rooms
@alex - room available if you want (confirmed w/ my co-worker; he's coming in on Wed. pm)
@yarkot cool, that'd be great
@alex: Ok - you're on;  I'll send Ewa a note to put your name down  (cc you) in case you get in before me (I think I'm in around 4:30??).
@gulopine - you still looking for a roommate?
I've got friends that are a 40 minute drive, but thinking it might be nice to stay on-site during the conference.
You guys know there's a room-sharing wiki page, right? http://us.pycon.org/2011/tickets/room_sharing/
@holdenweb -it's the first link in the thread :)
Hello, I have a room & need a roommate. March 8-15 at Days Inn, a little cheaper than Hyatt. Please email evgeny.fadeev@gmail.com
@jessenoller: As a trainer I understand the value of repetition :)
@Evgeny: still looking for a roommate?
I'm looking for a roommate. Don't have a room yet, but it would be the Days Inn, 9-13 or 8-13, since I am driving down from Charlotte. email at flaviu@closedbracket.com
@closedBracket Email sent :)
@gg Email received, replied to, sent. (this is as efficient as Outlook .pst files)
I just posted on the Pycon wiki page - I'm willing to share a room at either the Hyatt or nearby hotel. ideabrian@gmail.com I'll be there from 8th to 17th
Being lazy and not figuring out my password for the website, have room for someone at conf hotel 10-17th. Would be cool to have someone sticking through the sprints and such.
I had shared room with others from 9th to 12th nights.  But, I will not leave Atlanta until 18th.  I need to share room with some one from 13th to 18th nights.

How late do activities run each night?  I live in Marietta so I just plan on driving downtown every day but might end up getting a room/sleeping on the sidewalk if we'll be hanging out pretty late every night.
I have a double bed room on the 11th (Friday) and 12th (Saturday), not opposed to sharing for 50% cost

I have a room with @wolever from the 13th through the 17th. We're looking for a couple people interested in sharing the room (and the cost) during the sprints. Drop me an email if you're interested: g@briel.ca
@ThinkerYzu drop me an email, if you're interested
@sontek IIRC, things cool down around 11-12ish… But it won't be too hard to find people staying up 'till 2 or 3.
@gg I sent a note. I'd be interested for room sharing during sprints.
Also @mitechie did you still have a room to share? I'm staying with a friend, but he's a 40 minute drive away, so it might be nice to stay locally.
@brianball No, I found a roomy for the conference. Sorry.
If anyone still needs a roommate for the 11th/12th/13th, I'm looking for a place :)
@gg does you still need a roommate? Did you receive my mail?
@ThinkerYzu, @brianball sorry for taking a while to get back to you guys...I had some trouble getting on the wifi yesterday
@gg - I don't see an email. Can you send again?
@gg Does it means we have tree people, now?
I've got room for someone tonight through the 14th.
@gg I don't get an email too.
@jimallman if you can get in with @joshmarshall for the sunday night, that might work out better
hey guys,
i just got these emails sent out. sorry for taking so long. Basically, yes, if you guys don't mind squishing in a bit, I think we should all be fine
@joshmarshall: in the Hyatt?  i need a bed just for Sunday night (Mar 13)
(cot or rolloway is fine)
We're in the hyatt, and if there are 4 or 5 of us, then it should be pretty cheap per night (about $30 night), i think
^ @brianball @ThinkerYzu
It is cool.. How can I find you?
I'm looking to share a room sun, mon, tue and wed night
my roommate leaves today and i'll be here till wednesday, so ping me if you want to share room
anyone looking for a room for the sprints, come meet now at the job board, right beside the registration desk
right, my flight is somewhere wednesday afternoon
we have one room full, and we're probably going to put one or two more rooms together
ok, sounds reasonable. And you have the room booked through until wednesday, right?
any ladies sharing a room?
ok, a bunch of us are together on the "centenial 1" side of the ballroom. come meet us if you're looking for roommates
or you're in a hurry
ok, cool. So yea, come meet us after lightening talks
ok, I'm wearing a green zip-up sweater
after the lightnings?
sure

together *in the back row*
3's too much
okay
so you have a room and are looking for 1 (2?3?) people to join you?
and remember, tuesday night is my last one
if i can't find you -- i'm in the purple shirt

i'm in the A room
